title: SET_HEALTH_CONFIG_HURT_THRESHOLD

0x98DF1A83// SetHealthConfigHurtThreshold
void SET_HEALTH_CONFIG_HURT_THRESHOLD(char* configName, float newValue);Parameters:configName: Name of health config.newValue: ValueSets default hurt health threshold value for specific health config.
